ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The help extended by Mr. Yogesh Kumar Sood (Deputy Assistant Director) and his staff at Central Research Institute (C.R.I), Kasauli (H.P.), India, is duly acknowledged. The help provided for GC-MS analysis by Sophisticated Analytical Instrumentation Facility (SAIF), Panjab University, Chandigarh is also highly acknowledged.
